name: Inferno Blossom
property: Petals radiate heat and never burn out

name: Frostvine Lily
property: Freezes any water around its roots

name: Whisper Fern
property: Produces faint voices when wind passes through

name: Emberleaf Oak
property: Its leaves burn like embers but never turn to ash

name: Crystal Thorn Rose
property: Thorns are transparent and razor sharp

name: Sunflare Dandelion
property: Releases tiny sparks when its seeds are blown
